item.description:
Get in shape before the season!! The Wedeln Ski and Snowboard Race Team will hold dryland training every Tuesday night this Fall. The workout is great for anyone who wants to get in shape, you do not have to be a skier or racer. All fitness levels are welcome but come ready to sweat.

This week Darlene will take the lead for most exercises. There is no charge - we are just a bunch of skiers and riders trying to help each other get in shape.

Please wear work-out clothes and athletic shoes with some ankle support.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be near the center of the common
item.name: Ski Fitness Training
